ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course is a once-in-a-lifetime experience; if you enjoy doing independent research and learning things about Afro-Atlantic art, dance, and culture that you would not otherwise do on your own, this is the perfect course for you.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course opened my mind to the intellectual richness of dance -- its aesthetic significance in social and political history, and its importance to an understanding of human nature and social relations.
